# netbox_sites (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Gets all the Netbox sites
data "netbox_sites" "this" {
}

output "sites" {
  value = data.netbox_sites.this.ids
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `ids` (Set of Number) The IDs of the site.
